aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: I've been a tech lover since childhood, and coding has always been my dream job. What excites me most about programming is the ability to bring ideas to life and solve real-world problems through technology. My passion for continuous learning and curiosity about how things work drive me to constantly improve my skills and stay up to date with new tools and technologies.
aboutMe.location: I'm based in Essen, Germany. I'm open to different ways of working, including remote work and relocation, depending on the opportunity and team.
aboutMe.learning: I'm always excited to learn new things and gain more experience. In the IT field, it's essential to stay up to date—and that mindset fits me perfectly. I'm open-minded, curious, and always looking for opportunities to grow and improve my skills.
aboutMe.problemSolving: I approach challenges with a mix of logic and creativity. I see obstacles as learning opportunities and stay persistent in finding clean, effective solutions. Collaboration, curiosity, and analytical thinking are key to how I solve problems in coding.

skills.title: My skills
skills.intro: Here’s a look at the front-end technologies I’ve worked with so far. Through each project, I’ve deepened my understanding and learned how to apply these tools effectively to create engaging and functional user interfaces.
skills.learningText: I'm always looking to expand my skill set and explore new technologies. Frameworks like Vue.js or React.js really interest me because they offer powerful ways to build modern, interactive web applications. I'm also excited to dive deeper into backend development to better understand the full picture of web applications and become a more well-rounded developer.

join.title: Join
join.subtitle: JavaScript | CSS | HTML
join.description: Responsive Kanban-style task manager with drag and drop, user and category assignment. This was a team project. I was mainly responsible for developing the board page with drag and drop functionality and the add-task page for creating and categorizing tasks.

sharkie.title: Sharkie
sharkie.subtitle: JavaScript | CSS | HTML
sharkie.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie find coins and poison bottles to fight the killer whale.

crm.title: Simple CRM
crm.subtitle: Angular | Firebase
crm.description: A very simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.subtitle: JavaScript | HTML | CSS | API
pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

general.title: 1. General Information
general.text: Protecting your personal data is very important to me. I treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with data protection laws and this privacy policy. Using this website is generally possible without providing personal data. If personal data (such as name or email address) is collected, it is always done on a voluntary basis whenever possible.

dataCollection.title: 3. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
dataCollection.text:
I only store personal data if you provide it via the contact form or by email. This data will only be used to process your request and will not be shared with third parties.

May include:
- Name
- Email address
- Message text

logfiles.title: 4. Server Log Files
logfiles.text:
The website provider automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. These include:
- Browser type and version
- Operating system used
- Referrer URL
- Hostname of the accessing computer
- Time of the server request

This data cannot be assigned to specific individuals. No combination with other data sources is made.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.text: This website does not use cookies for tracking or analytics.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.text:
You have the right to:
- Access your stored data
- Correct inaccurate data
- Delete or restrict the processing of your data
- Revoke any given consent
- File a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority

form.title: 7. Contact Form
form.text: If you send me inquiries via the contact form, your information from the form, including the contact details you provided, will be stored for the purpose of processing your request. This data will not be shared without your consent.

ssl.title: 8. SSL Encryption
ssl.text: This site uses SSL encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
